column5: Hello guys, I was wondering if anyone fished Puslinch lake this ice season ...how it is and where you can access the lake...is it possible at the marina, at the restaurant? couple of seasons ago there were some issues with access, people leaving garbage all over...owner was upset and stopped  allowing access thru the property...i was wondering if is OK now, so if any of you have any info, please...and thank you! Gino
U can walk out from restaurant this year. Do not park there though. Park out on road.
